channel.title: IDE on Mr. Pointing
channel.description: Recent content in IDE on Mr. Pointing

item.title: PyCharm IDE Features
item.description: Get Acquainted with PyCharm The project view is one of the main tool windows, containing the project directory, external libraries, and scratch files. You can also open it with Alt 1. The Python interpreter is easily viewable in the status bar in the bottom right. You can run, debug, or other option on the top right of the window. You can also press Shift F10. We got an unexpected error in our code, featured below.
